hibernate-mapping.query: select record.userUid from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext in ( from CourseImpl as course where course.siteContext=:siteContext )
from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course and participant.userUid=:userUid
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
from InstructorRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section and participant.userUid=:userUid
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course=:course and section.category=:category )

from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.userUid in (:userUids) and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course=:course and section.category=:category and section.uuid != :sectionUuid )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participation where participation.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid and participation.userUid=:userUid

from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.userUid=:studentUid and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext=:siteContext and section.category=:category )
select count(enr) from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.learningContext.uuid=:learningContextUuid
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
select enr.userUid from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid=:courseUuid and section.category=:category )
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext.id in ( select section.id from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid = :courseUuid )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as member where member.userUid not in (:userUids) and member.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext = :siteContext )
select enr.userUid from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext = :siteContext )
select ta.userUid from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as ta where ta.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext = :siteContext )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
